Reviews.Title: “From bad to worse”
Reviews.Author: pevast
Reviews.Content: Location is great, so are some of the staff. Mind you far from all. The few good ones really tries to make a difference. The rest of this hotel is just a big joke. Stayed many times at York over the past years, office is just around the corner. Have seen the extreme drop in quality, both in the standard and in their service. Can't belive that this still is a three star hotel. Rooms are unfresh. Soiled carpets, brekfast another joke, their lobby daytime mostly like a busstation. Night time even worse. Business center, so called, not even a joke. Morning papers, forget it. Professional reception, of course not. Bed bugs in the rooms, of course. The list can be long. And few things are good news, the rest just bad. Inspite of all this the hotel has obviously been able to fill their rooms pretty well. The solution appears to have been group travel. Years back you could find many european nationalities coming with groups to stay at York. A couple of years ago it was mostly Iranians, now it seems that the groups are only from Pakistan. Don't improve the quality, just change the customers, that seems to be the idea of keeping the cash flow running. There are many really good hotels in Dubai offering fair deals. York is not one of them. Take a good advice and stay out of this place.

Reviews.Title: “nightmare after christmas !!”
Reviews.Author: RoozbeH
Reviews.Content: I was booked into this hotel by my travel agent on christmass eve on a business trip to Dubai,it was located near were I needed and it was a three star so I thought it could be normal, but the minute i walked into the room the nightmare started, the place was crap ,old and shabby and more it was dirty,even the fresh (yeah right!) had stains on them! Bed sheets were old and as upyou can see in the photos i provided they were thorn and then repaired !! Room had a bad smell and for hot water you had to turn on a switch and wait 10 minutes to have it ( wtf it's 2011 !!) the bathroom was disgustingky dirty with moulds in the shower and eventhough i'm not a big guy i couldnt easily fit in to the shower ! The worst of worst starts from early evening with many prostitutes,pimps and their customers hanging around the small lobby area ...! Staff were good but a lady in the evening shift treated us the worst as we were checking out running away ... So I strongly suggest Not to stay ... There ar much better chain hotels around with same price !

Reviews.Title: “Average offering at best”
Reviews.Author: melvint83
Reviews.Content: Stayed here once on business, during Jan 2011. Service is alright(they staff were very helpful), Rooms are clean & the breakfast is alright. But i have found other hotels in Dxb that offer better value for my money. Was bored in the evening & checked out one of their clubs, they have an international one & an indian club. Was not very impressed, the drinks are priced fair.

Reviews.Title: “have to see it to believe it- perfect location”
Reviews.Author: harrydapoet
Reviews.Content: First off, i have been to this location atleast 50 times in the last 5 years, the latest was january 2011. I stayed in York international maybe 4 times, but every trip to Dubia i always visit York- NO MATTER WHAT! the location is perfect, the 2nd u step ouside, you become emerged with the moving sea of people, people of every culture. Everything you need is within 100ft or just across the huge intersection. restaurants, grocery, watches, phones, banks, clothes to shop. the mall and museum is walking distance, computer repair shop, pharmacy, bakeries, and taxis at the drop of the dime, at night time, they just sitting outside waiting for you. the taxis never cheat you, all taxis are metered. but the bus stops are much cheaper, now there are trains that take you to ur destination. The airport is only 15 minute drive. Now to the meat and potatoes, there is a club inside that will blow your mind, if you are single- PLEASE TAKE NOTE! the 1st time i went , i thought it was a dream, the ratio is bananas- for every one guy, there are 7 women or more- there is a live band that is pretty good, the food is great and the bear is not to expensive, maybe 30 diner. the band leaves around midnight- and thats when the dj takes over! and the place becomes a dance-a-thon, the dance floor is in the back and to the right. Back gto the women, alot of working gals, but they love to dance and so many nationalities, they aint scared to come chat with you. very interesting place and unique in many ways. by the way, the club is free before 830pm. a great place for singles, couples, and friends hanging out. The women are mostly from Ethiopia, Russia, Phillipines, iran, and other locations, but trust me, they are BEAUTIFUL!! York international is a place that- if ask any man who has been there to party- especially american or brittish- ask them where did they party and im sure ()% or better have visited THE YORK INTERNATIONAL- MORE THAN ONCE- LOL, WHAT HAPPENS IN YORK, STAYS IN YORK! LOL- most people stay at another hotel and come to york to party- york does not allow the girls to come up to ur room, so i now stay at other locations, but York always get my money, cuz i go there to party like a rock star!

Reviews.Title: “Not bad”
Reviews.Author: MansourAldhlaan
Reviews.Content: It's a nice hotel with friendly staff, but you can stay at a better hotel with their room price.

Reviews.Title: “Action hotel”
Reviews.Author: Mikecoss
Reviews.Content: This was my first official stop over in dubai, I had been many times before but to the closer airport hotels and not into Bur Dubai itself. The hotel itself is very well priced and is in a great location. I was very surprised as to the nightlife there within the hotel, there is a nice nightclub and the service from the front desk was decent. i found the staff to be rather friendly and was surprised as to some reviews to the opposite. I imagine people are as friendly as we are to them. The rooms were spacious, clean, and the bed comfortable. the TV channels were all fuzzy though.......I would stay here again although i would only recomend it to solo travellers or business travellers

Reviews.Title: “Hotel full of Prostitutes”
Reviews.Author: whoimi
Reviews.Content: Booked this hotel for a few days Location = Excellent! Khaleed Bin waleed Metro station is very close by and you can get around dubai using the metro, this hotel is on a main busy road full of hustle and bustle! Whilst the Outside of the hotel looks good something you would expect of a 4 star hotel inside was absolutely awful! staff english was broken, rooms was basic tired and looking old with a bit of stains here and there on the bed and walls and bathroom needs dire upgrading. HOWEVER it gets even worse post 21:00pm its nothing but a pickup joint and a brothel there you will find phillipinos, russian, chinese and eastern europeans all looking for clients, with a lot of pervy men going Hooker shopping in the front as well as in the bar at that time and a typical scene you would see out of a brothel. Yes you will see the odd police car there but they turn a blind eye! Likewise an innocent drink in the bar will make you look as if you are soliciting with clients. I was with my wife and had to literally PROVE we were residents of teh hotel what really infuriated me was they thought my Wife was some sort of hooker which i picked up which really annoyed the hell outta me I was about to lose it with the reception staff, next day i packed up and went! I would NOT recommend this hotel for Families and couples its a brother at night

Reviews.Title: “Best of the best”
Reviews.Author: FayzHarare_Zimbabwe
Reviews.Content: Hi i stayed at this hotel for 4 nights, check inn was quick all done within 5 mins, my room was clean and the staff were very helpful, broken english but tryed thier best. The clubs in the hotel are just too too good, you dont need to leave the hotel at all, i did my business during the day and partied all night, the ladies are just awesome, only thing you cannot take any partners to your room, but that never worried me because the ladies have thier own apartments haha. Music was great, food was ok not my style but hey, woman over food?? WOMAN!!!!!!!!, load music never bothered me although my room was was the 2nd floor because i only get to my room after 5am!!!! i would recommend this hotel to every party animal out there, for sure i'll be back in 2 weeks time, till then Keep it up YORK , you guys just rock..

Reviews.Title: “hookers hookers hookers and more hookers”
Reviews.Author: DustyRN
Reviews.Content: Was visiting Dubia for a meeting with suppliers and my office booked a hotel near to the supplier and all was well with the world. As you walk in the bar on the right was full of old ugly pros desperate for attention. As I checked in I was told no guests in the room...Not that I had any intention off having guests in the room. Room a poor average,noise loud coming from streetr and disco. I was told there was a live band on that night so I went to the disco/bar on the second floor...me a guy called Bob and 200 hookers in attendance. I managed to stay for one drink, tried to watch the band and ended up having my privates touched before leaving...I wont be going back.

Reviews.Title: “York- you can endure it but not more.”
Reviews.Author: pevast
Reviews.Content: OK, location is good, sort of in the middle. Stayed there quite a few times as close to the office. Location is about the only true positive thing with York. Noicy at night. What ever you do never take a room below level 5. Lobby looks more then from Sodom and Gomorra then from a 3 star hotel after 21.00 hours. Brekfast is a killer. At least lukewarm now a days compared with few years back. However it is painful to eat. Close your eyes and chew. Business center and fitness center is a joke. OK, some staff really tries, friendly, helpful, reception though haven't a clue on service and for most parts not in english. Smelly AC and ventilation. For most parts fresh bedlinen but check for bedbugs. One time room infested with the little buggers. Managment not to happy to give even a small refund- how can you beet that in a 3 star hotel? 3 star- not. 2 or even 1 star would be more correct.

Reviews.Title: “NICE LOCATION BUT NIGHT CLUB IS A DAMPNER”
Reviews.Author: amitdhirwani
Reviews.Content: York is located ideally as the new metro station is right outside(will be up and running soon)..burjman mall upscale is 10 min walking...but the night club in the hotle is too loud and the activity goes on late into the night...which is a dampner...

Reviews.Title: “Resonable price and worth ur money”
Reviews.Author: coolkw1
Reviews.Content: I have visited the hotel in sept. 1. Price is great compare to other hotels. 2. I liked the staff, they were helpful. 3. location is good, approach to many useful near by places "Mall, Beach, Resturant, Metro etc etc..." 4. Singles can mingles, If they are new in town. 5. Highly Recomended for singles. 6. Breakfast is good. 7. Hotel room was clean. 8. Room service was exellent. 9. Best place for fun. 10. Prostitues are not allowed at any cost for the reputation "nice". 11. Hotel is quite after 3:30am. "After FUN" :) over all my experience was great and i wish to visit this hotel if i will travel alone or with friends. GREAT DEAL.... TRUSTH ME... If you want to have fun~ visit this hotel. Regards

Reviews.Title: “HOTEL IS TEREBE STAFF ARE BAD”
Reviews.Author: mpazoki
Reviews.Content: Last week I was in this place they rated 3 star hotel ,But this hote shoud be one star . food is bad , Resepionist is philipino and can not speak englishn also she is very rood and unperfesional . all bed sheet is too old and the color is chenged to yellow .I travel toDubai alot and this place is reall BAD to stay..

Reviews.Title: “Great place to party”
Reviews.Author: Expatindamidleast
Reviews.Content: The spot was decent, the price was right, and the room service was normal. Good price for a decent place - ask for a room on the upper floors. The night life was on top of the world! It was like Vegas, except you don't have to worry about your wife finding out before you reach home. Schedule it as a lay over and get there when you can, you have almost all night to party. Pass by the club on the first floor and head upstairs!

Reviews.Title: “Decent place to stay”
Reviews.Author: aerosumit
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for 2N/3D with friends for Dubai trip. Decent rooms, good location, connectivity to rest of the city is good. Buffet breakfast was fine.

Reviews.Title: “Not suitable for families”
Reviews.Author: gujral_abhinav
Reviews.Content: An ok hotel if ur travelling alone.... however not recommended if ur with families... the lobby area becomes a night club at night time and the music is so loud that if ur on the 1st floor, u wont get to sleep till 3 am.....

Reviews.Title: “Small, old rooms and noisy hotel”
Reviews.Author: Sir_Top-Hat
Reviews.Content: Stayed in the York for 3 or 4 nights, during a business trip. Hotel is nicely located in the centre of Bur Dubai (although there are currently road works in front of the hotel, making it difficult to stop in front of it) However, the rooms are quite bad (small, old, and not very well kept) and quite a bit of noise travels up from the (very busy) nightclub in the lower floors. Room rate included breakfast. However, I would have done much better eating anywhere but at the hotel! Not a horrible experience, but there are better choices.

Reviews.Title: “very mediocre”
Reviews.Author: crazy2210
Reviews.Content: we had just entered dubai without any hotel reservations.. and there was no place to b found.. so we had to stay at this hotel which was definitely overpriced.. no proper room service.. a loud disc downstairs making it difficult for us to sleep.. though d food is quite good.. but d best part is d location.. quite close to d market..

Reviews.Title: “Nightlife”
Reviews.Author: ammu6630
Reviews.Content: Occupying a central location in the heart of Bur Dubai, the York International Hotel is within easy reach of the Indian Bazaar, the famous Dubai Creek, the Dubai Museum and some of the city’s top shopping malls. The hotel features a total of 111 guest rooms and suites. All of the rooms are neatly furnished, well-decorated and feature a range of modern amenities including satellite television. Leisure facilities at the York International Hotel include a rooftop swimming pool and sun terrace. Guests can also take advantage of the daily complimentary shuttle service that operates between the hotel and Jumeirah Beach Park.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value”
Reviews.Author: Contractor99
Reviews.Content: The York has really cleaned up over the last five years. I was there in 2005 and it was a bit unclean, to be kind. I returned in late January, 2010, to find the place cleaned up, literally and figuratively. The room I had was very clean, and looked like it had been recently redecorated. I was actually moved from a room on a lower floor due to excessively loud music from the club, but that room, too, was very clean. So I had a chance to see two rooms that were similarly clean and well maintained. There is "action" in the multiple clubs and bars on the ground floor, but the working ladies are not allowed up to the guests' rooms anymore. It is not the York Hotel it once was. It is much cleaner, but much less fun for the man traveling solo. You have to take care of your fun someplace else because they will not allow it as they did in years past.

Reviews.Title: “Do not be fooled by the website and photos of this hotel - DO NOT STAY HERE!”
Reviews.Author: Sightseeing1000
Reviews.Content: Originally was taken in by the great location of this hotel, being in Bur Dubai, it is close to the Dubai Museum and great for the Big Bus Company stops. I checked the website and photos to get an idea of the hotel and standard of 3 star. However, it does not give you a realistic view of a construction site outside the front door, the poor breakfast offer that is often included in a package price. The hotel is also home to a club and bar - and being a small hotel - you do feel like you are sleeping above a nightclub! The guests it attracts to the club seem far from "legitimate". The staff were reluctant and rather didn't move us to a higher floor (they have a total of 7 floors) to try and silence the noise. There are much better hotels in the area of Bur Dubai to choose from, for a 3 star, i fear they have stuck on another 2 on their own accord, as there are much better choices out there.

Reviews.Title: “loved the passion”
Reviews.Author: skjain_infoline
Reviews.Content: well what to say about this big hotel...its sexy and excellent luxury lifestyle was one of the closest romantic evenings i have spend there guys. this hotel is a perfect luxury was a night club which is just too good. there is some cover charges and they get u two drinks free somewhat like that was the scheme when i visited. u will also get good looking beauties whom u can ask for date in the night club if your're a chap.. further to discuss is the hotel rooms ...evrything is excellent from reception to hotel rooms...ldc tv, interne taccess, room service, room ambinece, luxury, location everything is just perfect about this hotel. its in the heart of dubai and near to airport too..further the night club is open till 3 am here and its just the blow.... only a single thing please dont miss the night club there

Reviews.Title: “great hotel for a boys holiday”
Reviews.Author: lee345
Reviews.Content: Great for a boys holiday with hookers sports bars and clubs close by, hotel rooms are ok, i wouldnt do with my family though,

Reviews.Title: “In Short You Name it and you get it there.....Feel you are in Heaven”
Reviews.Author: AladinKhan
Reviews.Content: Most Important of All.....You find it like youtr Second Home. From the Day i visited York International i never thought of visiting any other Hotel for Fun and Joy. Indian and Pakistani Staff knewed how to deal with Customers and you had a Good varieties of Food and Drinks...... It was my first foreign trip. The hotel is excellently located in Bur Budai on the main road maintained, clean Rooms and Toilets, Polite staff. The Night Club was mindblowing and Specially you can Experience a Visit to Dilkash and Sur Taal a Indian Club.....Listen to Chill Out Indian Songs with Fun.... At the End dont know how will it matter to Other's But You drink you feel to have some Extra Fun You Know what i mean to say Which all ages of men will like to have.......Take Away G_R_S from all different Countries....oooohlalalala

Reviews.Title: “An absolute disgrace..”
Reviews.Author: RobEK
Reviews.Content: What a vile hotel. Old and tired. The place is HEAVING with prostitutes. It's an utter hole that should be shut down. I went to the nightclub and there were HUNDREDS of them there, with their pimps lurking in the corners. Vile, seedy , dirty and very uncomfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Good Place, Excellent Location”
Reviews.Author: imrajforu
Reviews.Content: It was my first foreign trip. The hotel is excellently located in Bur Budai on the main road. Old Infrastructure but maintained, clean Rooms and Toilets, Polite and courtcious staff. Buffet breakfat was average. The Night Club was mindblowing. Overall experience - GOOD

Reviews.Title: “Very rude reception staff”
Reviews.Author: Woudenberg
Reviews.Content: The staff at reception is very rude, have no common sense, have no common courtesy, its full of prostitutes, rooms are fairly nice though if you get one at the top floors so you don't hear the indoor disco.

Reviews.Title: “Not bad hotel, Good Value”
Reviews.Author: MerlsWA
Reviews.Content: I only stayed in Dubai as a transit stop from Europe. I was pleasently surprised with the York. A big hotel, the location is quite good. Staff greeted me friendly and were very helpful. The room was spacious and clean. Food was very reasonable. I did not use the pool. I note comments regarding prostitutes in the lobby- I wasnt aware of anything activity like this going on. the hotel does have a bar/nightclub but that certainly didnt make the stay any less enjoyable. I was very happy with the price of the York. This is certainly a very reasonable choice of hotel.

HotelInfo.Name: York International Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 101 Khalid Bin Al Waleed Street, Dubai 11449, United Arab Emirates
